<!-- {{< include templates/_event_description.qmd >}} -->

<p>We are happy to announce that a collaboration of <a href="https://leibniz-psychology.org/">ZPID</a>, LMU OSC, and LMU University Library will present the movie "<a href="https://paywallthemovie.com/">Paywall - The Business of Scholarship</a>" in Munich.</p><p>The movie is a documentary which focuses on the need for open access to research and science. It questions the rationale behind the $25.2 billion a year that flows into for-profit academic publishers, examines the 35-40% profit margin associated with the top academic publishers, and looks at the factors impeding global academic innovation.</p><p>We will live-screen the movie, and have a <strong>subsequent panel discussion</strong>, featuring the following panelists:</p><ul>
<li>Prof. Jason Schmitt (Director and producer of the movie; Clarkson University, USA)</li>
<li>Prof. Michael Bosnjak (Leibniz Institute for Psychology Information, ZPID, Trier)</li>
<li>Volker Schallehn (Head of Open Access Publishing, University Library, LMU)</li>
<li>
<a href="../../members/individual_members/lmu-members/plesnila/index.html" title="Plesnila">Prof. Nikolaus Plesnila</a> (LMU Open Science Center; University Hospital of Munich)</li>
</ul>
<div>The event will start by a short opening speech by our speaker, <a href="../../members/individual_members/lmu-members/auspurg/index.html" title="Auspurg">Prof. Katrin Auspurg</a>, and will be moderated by OSC member <a href="https://www.ibe.med.uni-muenchen.de/mitarbeiter/mitarbeiter/hoffmann/index.html">Dr. Sabine Hoffmann</a>.</div><p>See the <strong>trailer</strong> here: <a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YaHlcwyn2Jk&amp;feature=youtu.be">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YaHlcwyn2Jk&amp;feature=youtu.be</a></p><p>The event will take place on <strong>Friday, Dec 14, 2018 from 14:30 to 16:30 in Lecture Hall M 018, Geschwister-Scholl-Platz 1, LMU Munich</strong>.</p><p><strong>Claim your (free!) ticket here</strong>: <a>https://leibniz-psychology.org/</a></p><p><img height="73" style="display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;" width="73" class="left" src="../../images/paywall_qr.png" alt="paywall_qr"></p><p><strong><br></strong></p><p><strong><br></strong></p><p><strong><br></strong></p><p><strong>Organized by:</strong></p><p><a href="../../index.html" title="eOpen Science Center"><strong><img height="55" width="175" class="left" src="../../images/lmu-osc_logo_large.jpg" alt="LMU-OSC_logo_large"></strong></a></p><p> </p><p> </p><p>  <a href="https://leibniz-psychology.org/"><strong><img height="55" width="223" class="left" src="../../images/zpid.png" alt="zpid"></strong></a></p><p> </p><p> </p><p> <strong><a href="https://www.en.ub.uni-muenchen.de/index.html">University Library of the LMU</a><br></strong></p><p><strong><br></strong></p><p style="text-align: left;"> <a href="paywall_poster.jpg" title="paywall_poster"><img height="580" style="display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;" width="415" class="left" src="paywall_poster.jpg" alt="paywall_poster"></a></p><div class="g-clear"></div>
